title: Total DC Comics for 8-27-2014 (darkhomr) [ALL]
description:
This is the 21st week of a Total DC pack. Similar to my Total Marvel pack, this gathering of comics will include both DC Universe and non-universe titles. What will be in here will be Vertigo comics, non-DC Universe titles, and any digital titles released by Friday morning. This release has 14 DC Universe comics 3 non-Universe titles and 9 digital titles. 

My release packs are as follows: 

 
DC Universe 52 (Wednesdays based on scanners release times, but not later than Friday morning)
Marvel NOW! (Marvel Comics in the NOW! universe will be released Wednesdays, based on scanners release times)
Total Marvel (All Marvel Universe comics, released on Friday, based on scanners release times)
Independent Comics (Non-DC Universe and Major Independent comics, released between Sunday and Monday morning) 
Total DC (all DC comics released for the current week.  Released by Saturday each week.  Does not include digital only releases)
DC Monthly (all DC Universe comics for the month, released the first Friday after the end of the month)
Total Marvel Monthly (all Marvel Universe comics, released the first Tuesday after the end of the month)





All Star Western #34 (8/27/2014)

FINAL ISSUE Time has finally caught up with Hex as he battles to the death against his worst enemy: Jonah Hex! 

Aquaman #34 (8/27/2014)

The ruthless Chimera has arrived to destroy Aquaman - and Arthur may not be powerful enough to stop him! But with Atlantis in turmoil, does he have any allies left to save him? 

Batman '66 Meets The Green Hornet #8 (8/27/2014)

Following a stalemate with the Green Hornet and Kato, Batman and Robin pursue the valuable coins stolen from the Gotham Bank. But are the coins bait for another trap?

Batman Beyond 2.0 #30 (8/27/2014)

As Batman squares off against a jokerized Vigilante, the Phantasm shows up to finish the job

Batman: The Jiro Kuwata Batmanga #8 (8/27/2014)

Batman and Robin battle The Human Ball in a museum and the villains origin is revealed.

Batman Eternal #21 (8/27/2014)

After being injected with Fear Toxin, Alfred is dragged away to Arkham Asylum! 

Batman Superman #13 (8/27/2014)

A new arc begins following the events of 'FIRST CONTACT.' The worlds of Batman and Superman come to an explosive clash as something terrible happens to the World's Finest team, and a Dark Knight who is not quite himself must team up with Lois Lane to find a missing Man of Steel. Meanwhile, Selina Kyle encounters a person of amazing strength who has no idea who he is. 

Bodies #2 (of 8) (8/27/2014)

With four bodies lying on mortuary slabs, speculation mounts from a century ago to the present day as to the identity of the victim. In wartime Britain and a forgetful future, however, living strangers are causing confusion. A hooker's kiss, a fine young cannibal, a fascist mob and a suspect who literally falls from the heavens will send muddy ripples through history. The time-travelling serial-killer story heats up! 

Catwoman #34 (8/27/2014)

It's buyer beware when Selina purchases a new house - but Catwoman is much more interested in the treasure that lies beneath the property! 

Dead Boy Detectives #8 (8/27/2014)

After Charles and Crystal pledge to help one another in their investigations - no matter the cost - the duo set out to prove that Charles's father did not murder Charles's mother, and to find out whether Crystal really can bring her lost friend Rosa back from beyond the grave. Meanwhile, Edwin might discover the key to these mysteries - if he can break Tibetan Monk Lobsang out of a trance so deep he stopped breathing in 2012. 

Flash #34 (8/27/2014)

Time is getting closer as Future Flash reaches the point that broke his spirit - Wally West's death - while Wally meets his uncle Daniel, the Reverse Flash, and Barry Allen is trapped in the middle! 

Harley Quinn #10 (8/27/2014)

The first rule of Skate Club isÃ¢â‚¬Â¦you do not mess with the Mistress of Mayhem! Harley stumbles across an underground fight club where big money winds with a body count. She's inÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and she's making Sy Borgman her agent for the fights. But what happens when love gets in the way? 

He Man And The Masters Of The Universe #16 (8/27/2014)

'Wanted: He-Man and Adora!' After reaching the mystical island of Anwat-Gar, He-Man and Adora are still on the run from Hordak and his villainous Horde. And He-Man can't shake the suspicion they're being hunted - but by whom? Fan favorite villain Tri-Klops returns in the latest chapter of 'The Origin of She-Ra!'

Infinite Crisis: Fight for the Multiverse #14 (8/27/2014)

A reconstituted Mecha Superman leads Prime Cyborg, Flash and Zatanna into one final stand-off against Arcane Doomsday.

Infinite Crisis: Fight for the Multiverse #15 (8/27/2014)

Prime Cyborg, Flash, Zatanna and Mecha Superman uncover a possible way to banish Doomsday back to the Arcane world but debate the consequences.

Injustice: Gods Among Us: Year Two #21 (8/27/2014)

Ganthet of the Guardians takes a direct hand in the battle with fearsome results. And Black Canary moves in for the kill.

Justice League Dark #34 (8/27/2014)

Deadman's secret backstory is revealed...and the JLD battles Pantheon for the soul of paradise! 

New 52 Futures End #17 (8/27/2014)

Who is the Masked Superman? What does his identity have to do with last week's startling ending? The answers will shock you as the entire New 52 gets ready to jump five years into the future! 

Red Lanterns #34 (8/27/2014)

Guy Gardner vs. Atrocitus! The future of the Red Lanterns will be decided by the winner - and the loser faces certain death! 

Secret Origins #5 (8/27/2014)

The latest explosive origins from DC Comics - The New 52 include Cyborg by Marv Wolfman and AndrÃƒÂ© Coelho; Red Hood by Scott Lobdell and Paulo Siqueira; and Mera by Jeff Parker and the art team of Alvaro Martinez and Raul Fernandez. 

Sensation Comics Featuring Wonder Woman #3 (8/27/2014)

When Circe attacks the human defenders of Washington DC, Wonder Woman must win a battle without harming her attackers. But is there more going on than even she can see? "Defender of Truth" part 1 of 1.

Sinestro #5 (8/27/2014)

Sinestro and Hal Jordan have a score to settle - but they won't get a chance before the deadly cult of anti-emotion, The Paling, attacks! Plus, the answer to the question everyone's been asking: Where is Parallax? 

Smallville: Chaos #12 (8/27/2014)

Lex's ring soldiers have made plans that don't involve being his henchmen, or his fall guys. But as usual, he's one step ahead of everyone elseÃ¢â‚¬â€except Superman. We hope.

Star Spangled War Stories GI Zombie #2 (8/27/2014)

An undercover operation exposes a guided missile terrorist plot - and the only thing in its way is a zombie with an AK-47! 

Superman #34 (8/27/2014)

Geoff Johns and John Romita, Jr. continue their epic Superman run with 'THE MEN OF TOMORROW' chapter 3! Introducing the bizarre villain known as The Machinist - the man behind the recent technological attacks on Metropolis. But what is his strange connection to Superman? Where is he from? And what does The Machinist want with The Daily Planet? Plus, the mystery behind the disaster at the Ulysses Research Lab sends Clark on an investigation that will reveal a dark secret from his past. 

The Vampire Diaries #39 (8/27/2014)

BonnieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s figured out how to permanently end the ringleaderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s carnival, but will it cost Jeremy part of his humanity? Ã¢â‚¬Å“Carnival of SoulsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ part 3 of 3.
